# Load Data
wFire_csv = '../input/total-wildfires-acres-affected-1983-2020/Total Wildland Fires and Acres (1983-2020).csv'
supCost_csv = '../input/total-wildfires-acres-affected-1983-2020/Federal Firefighting Costs (Suppression Only).csv'

df_fire = pd.read_csv(wFire_csv, index_col='Year')
df_cost = pd.read_csv(supCost_csv, index_col='Year')

fig = make_subplots(rows=3, cols=1,
                    shared_xaxes=True,
                    vertical_spacing=0.02)

fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=df_fire.index, 
                     y=df_fire['Fires'],
                     name='Total Fires', marker_color='#91AEC1',
                     ), row=1, col=1)

fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=df_fire.index, 
                     y=df_fire['Acres'],
                     name='Acres Affected', marker_color='#508CA4',
                     ), row=2, col=1)

fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=df_cost.index, 
                     y=df_cost['Total'],
                     name='Total Costs', marker_color='#0A8754',
                     ), row=3, col=1)

fig.update_xaxes(nticks=25)
fig.update_yaxes(nticks=5)
fig.update_layout(title='Total Wildfires, Acres Affected & Suppression Costs in USA from 1983 to 2020',                   
                  title_x=0.5,
                  titlefont_size=18)
fig.show()
